name: Abus Numero 5510C Cable - Combo Lock 10mm x 180cm
description: Great as a secondary lock, the flexible coil fits easily in a pack or can be wrapped around part of your bike.Flexible coil cable is 10mm in diameter, 1.8m length offers options when looking for an anchor point.PVC cover prevents damage to your bike's paint.Moulded number on the dial won't wear off.Unlock code can be set to your go-to number.SCMU mounting system for tool-free installation.Abus security rating of 3/15.
